mapper.insert:
insert into res_texture
name, file_name, type, file_code, file_size, file_width, texture_attr_value, file_height, file_suffix, file_path, file_desc, lay_modes, style, texture, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, pic_id, att1, att2, numa1, numa2, remark, textureBall_file_id, normal_pic_id, normal_param, brand_id, texture_code,
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{textureAttrValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{laymodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{texture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textureBallFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{normalPicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{normalParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{textureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select a.id as resRextureId, a.texture_attr_value as textureAttrValue, IFNULL(a.file_height, 0) as fileHeight, IFNULL(a.file_width, 0) as fileWidth, IFNULL(a.lay_modes,'') as laymodes, IFNULL(a.normal_param,'') as normalParam, IFNULL(a.brand_id, 0) as brandId, IFNULL(a.texture_code,'') as textureCode, IFNULL(b.pic_path,'') as texturePicPath, IFNULL(b.small_pic_info,'') as smallPicInfo, IFNULL(c.model_path,'') as materialPath, IFNULL(d.pic_path,'') as normalPath, IFNULL(e.brand_name,'') as brandName from res_texture a LEFT JOIN res_pic b on b.id = a.pic_id LEFT JOIN res_model c on c.id = a.textureBall_file_id LEFT JOIN res_pic d on d.id = a.normal_pic_id LEFT JOIN base_brand e on e.id = a.brand_id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
